lyrics.lyric: Sunshine in the Rain
lyrics.tlyric: 雨中阳光

lyrics.lyric: When I'm in Berlin you're off to London
lyrics.tlyric: 当我在柏林时你正起飞去伦敦

lyrics.lyric: When I'm in New York you're doing Rome
lyrics.tlyric: 当我在纽约时你正在罗马

lyrics.lyric: All those crazy nights we spend together
lyrics.tlyric: 所有那些我们共同度过的疯狂夜晚

lyrics.lyric: As voices on the phone
lyrics.tlyric: 就像电话里的声音一样飘渺虚幻了

lyrics.lyric: Wishing we could be more telepathic
lyrics.tlyric: 希望我们能更加心有灵犀

lyrics.lyric: Tired of the nights I sleep alone
lyrics.tlyric: 我厌倦了那些独眠的夜晚

lyrics.lyric: Wishing we could redirect the traffic
lyrics.tlyric: 希望我们能够重定方向

lyrics.lyric: And we find ourselves a home
lyrics.tlyric: 找到一个属于我们自己的家

lyrics.lyric: Can you feel the raindrops in the desert
lyrics.tlyric: 你是否能感觉到沙漠中的雨滴

lyrics.lyric: Have you seen the sunrays in the dark
lyrics.tlyric: 你可曾见过黑暗中的曙光

lyrics.lyric: Do you feel my love when I'm not present
lyrics.tlyric: 当我不在你身旁你可否感觉到我的爱

lyrics.lyric: Standing by your side while miles apart
lyrics.tlyric: 虽远隔千里它却依然伴你身旁

lyrics.lyric: Sunshine in the rain
lyrics.tlyric: (我的爱如)风雨中的阳光

lyrics.lyric: Love is still the same
lyrics.tlyric: 对你的爱依然如故

lyrics.lyric: Sunshine in the rain
lyrics.tlyric: 如雨中的阳光

lyrics.lyric: Sunshine in the rain
lyrics.tlyric: 雨中的阳光

lyrics.lyric: Love is still the same
lyrics.tlyric: 对你的爱依然如故

lyrics.lyric: Sunshine in the rain
lyrics.tlyric: 如雨中的阳光

lyrics.lyric: Even if we call the highest power
lyrics.tlyric: 即使我们穷尽力气

lyrics.lyric: We can only do one town a time
lyrics.tlyric: 一次也只能游历一座城

lyrics.lyric: Words are not enough, action speaks louder
lyrics.tlyric: 行动总是胜过语言

lyrics.lyric: Second time around
lyrics.tlyric: (让我们)重拾往昔

lyrics.tlyric: 你是否能感觉到沙漠中的雨滴

lyrics.tlyric: 你可曾见过黑暗中的曙光

lyrics.tlyric: 当我不在你身旁你可否感觉到我的爱

lyrics.tlyric: 虽远隔千里它却依然伴你身旁

tlyric.lyric:
[00:13.420]当我在柏林时你正起飞去伦敦
[00:16.770]当我在纽约时你正在罗马
[00:21.070]所有那些我们共同度过的疯狂的夜晚
[00:24.720]就像电话里的声音一样飘渺虚幻了
[00:29.020]希望我们能更加心有灵犀
[00:32.590]我厌倦了那些独眠的夜晚
[00:36.539]希望我们能够重定方向
[00:40.290]找到一个属于我们自己的家
[00:44.359]你是否能感觉到沙漠中的雨滴
[00:47.959]你可曾见过黑暗中的曙光
[00:51.589]当我不在你身旁你可否感觉到我的爱
[00:55.329]虽远隔千里它却依然伴你身旁
[00:59.269](我的爱如)风雨中的阳光
